verses.name: Jeremiah 39:12
verses.text: Take him, and look well to him, and do him no harm; but do unto him even as he shall say unto thee.

verses.name: Jeremiah 39:13
verses.text: So Nebuzar–adan the captain of the guard sent, and Nebushasban, Rab–saris, and Nergal–sharezer, Rab–mag, and all the king of Babylon’s princes;

verses.name: Jeremiah 39:14
verses.text: Even they sent, and took Jeremiah out of the court of the prison, and committed him unto Gedaliah the son of Ahikam the son of Shaphan, that he should carry him home: so he dwelt among the people.
